path.style: stroke: rgb(255,255,0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; is-custom-font: none; font-file-url: none; fill: rgb(255,255,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(255,255,0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; is-custom-font: none; font-file-url: none; fill: rgb(255,255,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

circle.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; is-custom-font: none; font-file-url: none; fill: rgb(255,255,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; is-custom-font: none; font-file-url: none; fill: rgb(0,0,0); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
